activities:
SnapEngage is a service provider of a chat service feature to customers.
Personal information is used to provide our service to our customers.

SnapEngage collects the following personal information:
 - Email address
 - Name
 - Cookies for purposes such as session handling

If our customer personally identifiable information changes, or if our customer no longer desires our service, our customer may correct, update, or delete it by making the change on our member information page or by contacting us by telephone or postal mail.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client and customer data process automatically and manually
recoursemech: TRUSTe dispute resolution as part of the TRUSTe Safe Harbor Program
